definition: content with one's lot/knowing one's place
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
surname An
part/share/ingredient/component

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
restless/unsettled
to be content with one's lot (idiom)/to know one's place

sentences.english: They treated their servants well, but expected them always to know their place.
sentences.chinese: 他們對待僕人不壞，但期望他們時時安分守己。

sentences.english: At present, the Public Security Bureau has been sounding instrument for proper disposal.
sentences.chinese: 目前，該探空儀已由公安分局妥善處置。

sentences.english: And for a while we will be cautious.
sentences.chinese: 我們會變得小心，安分一段時間。

sentences.english: Is uneasy again to divide, even if sit the contumacy of the heart bottom in uneasy cent also.
sentences.chinese: 再就是不安分，即使坐着也不安分的心底的叛逆性。

sentences.english: Is uneasy again to divide, even if sit the contumacy of the heart bottom in uneasy cent also.
sentences.chinese: 再就是不安分，即使坐着也不安分的心底的叛逆性。

sentences.english: Yellow bureau of substation of public security of this city Jiang An district is their pitch on object of the first hook in.
sentences.chinese: 他們選中該市江安區公安分局黃局爲第一個拉攏對象。

sentences.english: She was one of the most unoffending little countries in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 比利時是歐洲最安分守己的小國之一。

sentences.english: As the roaring rocket rose, the restless roosters rollicked.
sentences.chinese: 呼嘯的火箭升空，不安分的公雞喧鬧。

sentences.english: But those dauntless was not so obedient, they were playing 'table-tennis' on their desk.
sentences.chinese: 一些安分的在看書，而大膽的在桌上“打球”。

sentences.english: How much love can come back again, how many people are waiting, steady.
sentences.chinese: 有多少愛可以重來，有多少人值得等待，安分守己。

sentences.english: Must you call me, you unquiet one?
sentences.chinese: 難道你一定要呼喚我嗎，你這不安分的人？

sentences.english: The reporter called Xuanwu District Public Security Bureau asked on duty to avoid did not answer.
sentences.chinese: 記者致電宣武區公安分局詢問，值班人員迴避不答。

sentences.english: Mr. Huang, once China's richest man, is known for rocking the boat.
sentences.chinese: 曾一度是中國首富的黃光裕是出了名的不安分人物。

sentences.english: In another fashion I too was to hold still .
sentences.chinese: 我也得用另一種方式表現得安分守己。

sentences.english: Exactly how naughty were we in our ancestral environment?
sentences.chinese: 我們的祖先在他們的生活圈中究竟有多麼的不安分？
